name: Nine Lives (itch) (GoCreateFun)
description:
Nine Lives is a Cat Simulator game. You're a small cat who wakes up one day, and decides to wander the neighborhood.
This game will also run on a Gameboy Cart! You can download the .gb file and run it in an emulator or on real hardware if you wish.

The browser controls are 

Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter
Select - Shift

Made in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare
